task.title: How to italicize your text in a Microsoft Word document.
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to Italicize your text in a Microsoft Word document.

prereq.p: Your Word Application have to be installed on your device and you have to have a Microsoft Word document on which you can work on.

context.p: This task can help you when you want to quote someone's words.

step.cmd: Select the text which you want to be italicized.
Right click on the text and select the italicize option.

result.p: The selected text is italicized successfully on your document!

example.p: You can use this when you want to quote someone!
